comment: Used 2 smack packs, started with an OG of 1.060. Attenuation at 3 days of 70-72 degree ferment is good. Took a gravity reading, at 1.012!

Final gravity is 1.010! Very juicy and hopped up (a little more bitter than your typical NEIPA you find nowadays, less sweet, just the way I like it). The Maris Otter hangs on the finish, biscuity and tasty. We'll see what happens after it bottle conditions.
